HPI 8616 Nissan Skyline GT-R (BNR32) 1993 Sugo Group A 300km Race (JTC Round 3) 2nd Place A. Olofsson/M. Kageyama



Kazuyoshi Hoshino & Masahiko Kageyama drove the #12 Calsonic Skyline in the final year of the Group A-based JTC series. Anders Olofsson was no stranger to the JTC - having won the series championship in 1989 and 1991 - but was not a regular driver for any team that season. So what was he doing driving the #12 Calsonic Skyline in Round 3? Hoshino was injured in the F3000 Mine All Star race a week earlier so Olofsson replaced him for this one race.

Olofsson & Kageyama qualified in 3rd and went on to finish the race in 2nd. Olofsson also has the distinction of being the only driver to score points in both the JTC-1 and JTC-2 classes that season as a replacement for Hoshino (JTC-1) and Takayuki Kinoshita (JTC-2).
